attributes.action: learn from the examples set by Weimar Germany and Zimbabwe and not to print more money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown's plans to print more money in a bid to buy the UK's way out of the recession are frankly ludicrous.

As history has shown, printing more money is merely the first step towards making a currency worthless.

We urge you, Mr Brown, to heed our warning and to find a far more sensible way out of this mess.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
